title:
A bilevel optiization based algorithm for solving a class of price
  equilibrium problems
authors: Nguyen Ngoc Hai, Le Dung Muu, Nguyen Van Quy
abstract:
We consider class of equilibrium models including the implicit Walras
supply-demand and competitive models. Such a model in this class, in general,
is ill-posed. We formulate such a model in the form a variational inequality
having certain monotonicity property which allow us to describe a
regularization algorithm avoiding the ill-posedness based upon the bilevel
optimization for fnding a point that is nearest to the given guessed or desired
equilibrium price for the model. The obtained computational results with many
randomly generated data show that the proposed algorithm works well for this
class of the equilibrium models.
